contract_description: Outline the terms and conditions for the procurement of goods and/or services as specified herein.
objective: To outline the terms and conditions for the procurement of goods and/or services as specified herein.
scope: Office stationery and supplies, including pens, paper, folders, and other stationery items, as specified in the attached Purchase Order.
Any additional stationery items requested by the Buyer during the contract period.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Payment shall be made within 30 days of receipt and acceptance of the Deliverables. Invoices should be submitted by the Supplier in accordance with the guidelines provided by the Buyer.
delivery_terms: The Supplier shall ensure timely delivery of the Deliverables as per the agreed-upon schedule outlined in the respective Purchase Order(s). The Buyer shall inspect and evaluate the Deliverables upon receipt. Acceptance of the Deliverables shall be subject to compliance with the specified quality standards, specifications, and any other requirements stated in the Contract.
quality_assurance: The Supplier warrants that all Deliverables provided under this Contract shall conform to the specified quality standards, free from defects in materials and workmanship. In the event of any non-conformities or defects, the Supplier shall promptly rectify the issue or replace the Deliverables at no additional cost to the Buyer.
termination_clause: Either party may terminate this Contract in the event of a material breach by the other party. Termination shall be effective upon written notice to the breaching party. In the event of termination, the parties shall fulfill any outstanding obligations and settle any outstanding payments.
